summary:
A luxury Whiterun style manor house and estate (with stone docks) which is located on the south-east area of Lake Ilinalta. The house has been fully furnished with many unique items and re-textures to add more colour and style in-game without going OTT.
All crafting needs catered for plus 15 various skilled followers, many merchants and master tra
descriptionHtml:
**** VERSION1.1 is now available ****
A number of issues have been resolved with this version. See **CHANGE LOG for details 


**** NEWER VERSION V1B WITH MISSING TEXTURES FIX AVAILABLE **** 
Sorry for any inconvenience caused with version V1 and all the missing textures, these issues are now resolved, please update to new version V1B.



***** NO DLC REQUIRED ONLY SKYRIM.ESM (up to date)*****

Lake Ilinalta Manor sits on what\'s arguably one of the most beautiful locations in all of Skyrim, The Manor sits in the south west corner of the lake, roughly 500yds east from Half Moon Mill and directly south of The Lady Stone. The house has three defined paths off the main road 2 of which are sign posted.
The House mainly consists of three levels and a secret retreat (unknown location) only accessible through the house\'s internal portal system. The three main parts or levels of the house consist of the main house, basement and lower basement which are all accessible via manual entrance / exits or using the internal portal system.
The portal system is not just internal as in the Basement and Secret Retreat you have access to two more portal systems one for Markarth, Riften, Solitude, Whiterun and Windhelm while the other for Dawnstar, Falkreath, Morthal and Winterhold and they work using a scripted menu system.

*** The Portals will take you and any / all follower/s to the menu destination/s.

The mod also gives you two additional locations:

Doll\'s Lagoon -			A Lagoon for (yeah you guessed it) mannequin dolls 4 NPC / Followers.
				The dolls here though have been placed in a beautiful scenic cave with water features cascading throughout.
				Access via a portal on the lake\'s island where \'The Lady Stone\' resides
				Living Quarters for your Staff and Player inc Master bedroom with ensuite, a main living quarter for your staff inc Cooking Area / Shower / Lounge / 					Beds.
				Alchemy Station
				Dedicated Potion / Poison racks
				Fungal Cave
				Shrine of Dibella

Folgunruud	-		Main location setting for \'Claudia\'s Challenge\' (See Below)  		


This is my 1st \'released\' Skyrim mod but it\'s the 5th house mod I\'ve created using the CK and with over 1000 hours spent in the CK you can rest easy that this is not a newbie attempt. That said it\'s still my 1st release and while I\'ve ironed out many issues and bugs through testing, there maybe something I\'ve overlooked. 
No copy and paste in this mod, it\'s been built from the ground up with many texture changes but Lore friendly as can be. 


*** Cleaned with TES5Edit ***

	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________	

								FEATURES:
	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Stables  -			max 3 horses inc 1 x encounter horse plus a player owned fast horse \'Atacama\'


Animal Pen -		3 x Chickens - 1 x Cow


Stone Built Dock - 		1 x Row Boat \'Water Dragon\' a portal to skyrim\'s docks
				2 x fishing points 


Main Gate - 		Stone built turrets - Player Triggered Gate (Opens & Closes Automatically) 


Roads/ Paths -			3 x defined paths off the main south bank road of Lake Ilinalta which lead to the House (2 paths are sign posted)


Patio - 				Kistina one of your 2 bard\'s included will perform everyday and in the evening she\'ll perform for a small audience 


Main Hall - 			Chairs and Benches surround a large central fireplace 
				


Dining Room - 			2 x 4 Seated Dining Tables - Storage (Cupboards etc)


Alchemy room -            	*Potion / *Poison Racks / Fungus and flower gardens
 				*Potion/Poison Racks are labeled and the racks display are made using static items. 


Kitchen with Cook - 		Fully stocked and functioning with Estelle Ashton your cook
				She also makes her own secret recipe - Juniper Brandy a unique drink not found anywhere else in Skyrim and has restore stamina level and rate + restore 				health without and adverse effects or any addiction.
				You can purchase this from her along with all the vanilla food & drink.
			        

Several Bedrooms - 		Several bedrooms for staff and the player inc 4 Master Bed/rooms (Manor/Lower basement/DB Sanctuary/Doll\'s Lagoon)
				* All beds are owned by the player ;) and all residents belong to the player bed faction. Default followers will not be able to sleep here unless the 					follower belongs to the player bed faction. 


Blacksmith -  			Forge / Workbench / Sharpening Wheel / Smelter plus lots of indexed storage / Weapons-Racks


Enchanters Hall - 		Enchanting Station / City + Town + House Portal System)


Dovahkiin\'s Office -  		Custom Desk / Strongbox / Gold Safe / Chest / Display Cases


Secret Well - 			South West side of the house


Shrine of Talos - 		(Initially Locked)


Armory -         	 		7 vanilla mannequins / 6 Large Display Cases / 10 Small Display Cases / 2 x 4 weapon racks. 


Library -           		4 Book Cases / Seats for reading with a balcony view of the pool area.
				Shrine of Diurnal 


Jurgen Windcaller Shrine -  	A room dedicated to the \'hero\' of Skyrim


Dolls Room -        		30 Mannequin Dolls - 70% normal sized all different female npc\'s vanilla and custom including some favourites / Doll Effects controls / 2 Live dolls 					one of which is a master trainer of destruction magic.
				Indexed storage


Swimming Pool with Bar -  	Medium sized pool + 2 x Bar Merchants + Bard + House Guard


Sauna -                  		Steam Room + 3 x Showers + 2 Hand Basins


Staff Residence - 	       	3 x Beds / Kitchen / Lounge areas


Door Bell - 			The main house has doorbells @ both doors which play a familiar chime 


Temple of Diurnal -  		Nine Divine Shrines + Shrine of Diurnal + Priestess + Jaquzzi
				***** Shrine of Diurnal will give a blessing of Diurnal which is a mix of 4 vanilla blessings (fortify Speech/ Restoration/ Magicka/ Stamina + Cure 					Disease *****

Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary -  	Dungeon + Torture Chamber (inc unique sunlight torture cell) + Members residence + Training Area + Main Bedroom (Player shares with Astridia) :P
				12 Dark Brotherhood members, one of which is \'Atridia\' the twin sister of our favourite vanilla star Astrid and with all the combat traits of her 					sister (ideal for stealth players)

Wardrobe Hall - 	         	Huge walk-in Wardrobe Hall (20 Full Sized Mannequins all unique to one another 
				A Wooden Mannequin follower called Woody is the Level\'s main guard
				Many Wardrobes

Archery Range (EXT) - 		External 3 x various distanced archery targets + 1 x Combat Dummy

Archery Range (INT) - 		Internal 1 x archery target + 1 Combat Dummy (DB Sanctuary) *used
				* members of the sanctuary use the internal range to practice their combat skills	


	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

							LAKE ILINALTA MANOR ACTORS/COMPANIONS
	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

**F = Followers **M = Marriable
Nord / Elf Vampire = Custom race with most vampire skills but without sun / fire weakness.

             		MANOR EXTERIOR

Dawn Shade 		> Necro Skeleton exterior Guard **F
Dusk Shade 		> Necro Skeleton exterior Guard **F (ONe Handed Master Trainer)
Atacama			> Fast & strong Horse (Less health but 40% faster than shadowmere)

			MANOR HOUSE

Orla Ice Light 		> Nord (Mage Conjurer)**F (Alchemy Master Trainer) **M
Kirstina Wulfharth 	> Nord Bard **M
Estelle Ashton 		> Breton Cook / Food Merchant **M
Bandit 			> Dog with accented human and dog voicing **F

			MANOR BASEMENT

Yoshi 			> Khajit Blacksmith Merchant (Sneak Master Trainer)
Vaermina Artoria 	> Imperial Spell Vendor **F (Mage Conjurer)
Velva			> Nord Elf Vampire **F (Vamp Mage)
Hana Bjorn		> Nord Velva\'s girlfriend / thrall (Mage)

			MANOR LOWER BASEMENT

Svana 			> Nord House Guard **F (Scout)
Zoe San Bienne 		> Breton Inn Merchant (day) **F (Melee)
Nocturnal of Dragonstar > Redguard Inn Merchant (Night) **F (Mage Conjurer)
Liselle Kingham		> Breton Bard (Hot version of Lisette)

			SECRET RETREAT

Diurnal Of Dragonstar 	> Redguard Priestess of Diurnal godess of Beauty and Colour **F (Destruction Mage)
Astridia 		> Nord Combat Assassin **F (Astrid\'s hotter twin sister)
Rochelle La Rouche 	> Breton DB Jail Guard
Nimphaneta 		> Wood Elf DB Jail Guard
Nimphsymia Praetoria 	> Wood elf DB 1st Centurion Guard
Nimphyna Centurio 	> Wood Elf DB Centurion Guard
Nimphonia Centurio 	> Wood Elf DB Centurion Guard
Nymphahlam 		> Redguard DB Sister Guard
Nymphancola 		> Redguard DB Sister Guard
Nymphena 		> Redguard DB Ultra Sister **F (Combat Assasin)
Nymphluna 		> Redguard Db Sister Guard

			Dolls Lagoon

Alura Pure-Honey	> Nord **F
Sillshe Bluesky		> Nord/ Elf Vampire **F (Mage) **M
Stella Belle		> Nord/ Elf Vampire **M
Tiki Benoch		> Nord/ Elf Vampire **F (Mage) **M 



 30 Actors
175 Named custom mannequin/ dolls in total (Over 5 cells). 

Mannequins and Mannequin *Dolls (*reduced size by 30 - 50%)

Mannequin Stars:

Mannequin Doll Stars: (50% to 70% usual size)

*** All mannequin / dolls work like regular mannequins but look awesome (dependant on the sum of your other mods) and worthy to display your treasured armors / skimpy clothes etc... Even without mods they will still be a huge improvement on the wooden monsters (sorry Woody)

 
	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________		
						
CLAUDIA\'S CHALLENGE - TREASURE HUNT QUEST
	________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


The house has a side quest you can attempt to achieve by using your wits and hard earned skills.
The quest is called \'Claudia\'s Challenge\' she\'s the dragonborn\'s friend from another mod I\'ve yet to release. She will send you on a challenge which starts via a note that will direct you to a unique nordic ruin called \'Folgunruud\' which is infested with high level Draugre amongst other foes. The encounter zone created for this ruin is set to min level 30 with no max level set and with no restrictions on entry so you can attempt it at any level
The quest will show all stage entries in the Side Quest section of your Journal.
    
		****			WARNING		WARNING		WARNING		WARNING		WARNING		WARNING				****

Once you get so far into Folgunruud there\'s no going back and the only way out is to complete the challenge which as I\'ve stated has many high leveled draugre foe\'s waiting to ruin your day. I\'ve tried completing the Folgunruud part of Claudia\'s Challenge with a charactor at level 4 and with TGM enabled it took an age to work through the ruin, which is a medium to large sized ruin that should give even the best high level player\'s a good hour of gameplay from start to finish. I will not give too much away only to say the loot at the end will be worth the effort in the form of a unique and powerful item for skyrim.


	_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________					
							
EXTRA FEATURES
	_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


I\'ve created a conjuration spell tomb which summons \'Sister Saadia\' a character based on the vanilla character Saadia, she will use a plethora of powerfull spells for 60 secs in your aid. To summon her costs very little magicka and shouldn\'t be a problem for even low level players to cast and the book can be purchased from the Riverwood Trader.

	
	__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

							RECOMMENDED MODS
	__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


The House is a stand alone mod which does NOT require any DLC or mod to run. 
All that said I would highly recommend the following awesome mods to get the full effect intended from this mod.


Climates of Tamriel (Vanilla Nights 3) - JJTV 
Lanterns of Skyrim - Mannygt Mods (this mod lights up one of the Manor\'s road sign posts though not a requirment) 
Apachii Sky Hair - Apachii
Cover Women Look1 - mrlenski
HQ eyes - Xenius
UNP Dimonized skinny female body - Dimon99 (or CBBE which ever) ***ADULT ONLY***


	__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

							KNOWN ISSUES / POSSIBLE CONFLICTS ?
	__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


This mod will only conflict with mods that use the same cell/s - refer to map location for details. 
 
NOTE* When you activate the dolls and mannequins the game will display a \'Talk *NPC name\' message as opposed to \'activate mannequin\' message but otherwise they work exactly the same as the vanilla mannequins.

*** On your 1st visit to interior of the house you will most likely encounter invisible barriers which are the mannequins misbehaving, if so just leave the cell and reload it and they should have settled. On rare occassions it may take 2 - 3 loads for some of them to settle down, but after this they will remain in postion. 

Both the Secret Retreat and the Doll\'s Lagoon do not have load doors and can only be accessed via portals, so the followers from these cells need to be dismissed from service in their
native cells or they will just get stuck where you dismiss them.

Several X-Markers have been placed at all cities and towns for the portal system to work.

5 x row boats + x markers added for \'The Water Dragon\'s\' travel system (windhelm docks / Solitude Docks / Riften Docks (rear Honeyside) / Dawnstar Sanctuary Beach & Lake ilinalta Manor Dock) 


__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
	
							CREDITS
	__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


A big thankyou to the following (not in any order)

Bethesda 
Steam 
Skyrim Nexus
Creation Kit Wiki 
Artisanix for his framed art resources. 
All the community for their mods / hard work / priceless info and inspiration for without this mod would not exist.

and a special thankyou to the following tutorial authors: 

Darkfox 127 
Balok\'s    framed artwork tutorials
Hellcat 5  
Millerboy  
NeuroSpasm 
Bethesda\'s tutorial series 
JNTolm 
GophersVids

	 
	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

							FUTURE PLANS
	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


I will be adding some quests for both the Vampire Velva and also some Dark Brotherhood (or in the case of the Manor\'s lack of Male Actors) some Dark Sisterhood quests :) 
I may also add a quest to purchase the house if enough request it, but as it stands the house and staff are completely free.

I will most likely release a DLC version in the not too distant future.


	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
	
							FEEDBACK
	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

The Mod was made for you so feel free to give your feedback though I will only respond to constructive criticsm purely made for the improvement of the mod and to resolve issues (where possible).

Any suggestions for additions or adjustments will be considered.

Please return and give your rating and or subscribe thankyou.


AVAILABLE @ SKYRIM NEXUS ONLY (ATM)

DO NOT RE-DISTRIBUTE ANYWHERE ELSE WITHOUT PRIOR PERMISSION FROM MYSELF SO AS TO KEEP TRACK AND UP-TO-DATE.


	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

							ADDITIONAL INFO
	___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

CK exterior Cell Memory Loads

149.99Mb 109% - Lake Ilinalta Manor Ext1

CK Interior Cell Memory Loads

112.58Mb < 100%	Main House Cell
 97.90Mb < 100%	Basement
113.44Mb < 100%	Lower Basement
118.04Mb < 100%	Secret Level
 65.32Mb < 100%	Folgunruud
	 < 100% Doll\'s Lagoon

Mod was tested using win7x64 based Intel i5 2500K / SSD / 8Gb Ram / EVGA GTX570 (no O/C) @ Ultra Video settings (1680 x 1050 resolution)
author: bluenaim

files.name: LakeIlinaltaManorV1dot1
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced mannequin doll (small) count by around 30 dolls across the 5 cells and spaced out the remaining dolls (Full sized mannequins un touched)
Changed clue in note 3 of 'Claudia's Challenge' so the player will have no doubt as to what he/she needs to do to complete the final part of challenge
Added extra door levers into final halls of 'Folgunruud' to fix very rare issue where player may get stuck between the 2 final large doors in level.
'Bandit' the dog follower will now greet the player outside the house when the door bell is activated.
